雅思写作

小作文

静态图

没有时间变化的图
静态 — 研究对象是什么；数据从高到低的排序（谁和谁比较）
柱状图
从高到低写

概述 — 概括整体特征
极值（比较对象，类别）— 柱状图关注对比；饼图，只需要写极值排序
表格，极值，最XXXX

柱状图：写极值和整体对比

分段 — 主体段通常2-3段— 分析数据的关系，比较关系
主体段1：upper
As can be seen from the chart，XXXX 美国最多，数据，衔接，第二，衔接，第三，衔接，最少
多个数据，通常写最多，其次，最小；
写相似，相同，差值（多了多少，少了多少），分数，倍数

主体段2：
衔接 clearly，in terms of，初中，最多，衔接，差值体现第二，J，S 一样多少，衔接likewise，J，S，I 三国的中学XXX 和哪的什么数据一致，衔接，美国在这阶段的XXX 最多，数据

CC：分段逻辑；句与句之间，段与段之间什么关系，要加衔接表达

写完之后，自查一遍语法，词汇
词汇和语法的多样性和准确性都要给出符合欧洲英语标准C1-C2水平

占比句型

1）研究对象做主语
部分 ==accounted for== xxx% of 整体
The electricity produced by coal accounted for 47% of the total production in US.
Constitute, make up, represent, take up, comprise
2)百分比做主语
==The percentage of== 部分 is xxx% in 整体
The percentage of the electricity produced by coal was 47%in the whole production in US.
Proportion of, portion of
3）具体数据做主语
百分比+of +整体+be x% (of 整体) +==be accounted for by== + 部分
47% of the total electric energy productior was coal.
47% of the total electric energy productiorin US was accounted for by that produced by coal.
Be constituted by, be made up of, be represented by
4)用括号作补充引出数据
Most of electric energy productiol in US was by coal (47%)

占比的多样化表达

1%a tiny proportion
10%one in ten
20%one fifth
25%a quater/ one out of four
26%just over a quater
30%a third
32%around a third
49%almost、nearly a half
50%a half
75%three quarters

加定语的占比表达

1）with介词结构作定语修饰名词
Men with a skilled vocational diploma accountedfor 90% in 1999
2）ving做定语修饰名词（主动），分词形式做后置定语（被动）
Men holding a skilled vocational diplomaaccounted for 90% in 1999.
3）定语从句修饰名词（who/which/that)
Men who held a skilled vocational diploma accounted for 90% in 1999.

两个数据

1） A的单个数据表达，compared with 百分比 of B
Women with a data accounted for 70%,compared with 35% of men
2）A的单个数据表达， while the figure for B be+百分比
Women with a graduate diploma accounted for70%, while the figure for men was 35%.
3）整体+consist of +百分比 of A+百分比 of B
Those who held a skilled vocational diplomaconsisted of 90% of men and 10% of women

数据之间的比较

数据A>B
1)The percentage/proportion of A is higher than that of B
The percentage of women with a data is higher than that of men, 60% and 40% respectively.
The percentage of women who reached undergraduate diploma was higher than that of men, 70% and30% respectively.
2)More A than B do something
More women than men held an postgraduate diploma, 70% and 30% respectively.
3)outnumber 超过
Women with a postgraduate diploma outnumber their male ==counterparts==, 60% and 40% respectively.
Counterparts 作用相当的人或物

A accounts for a bigger percentage than B
The percentage of A is bigger than that of B
.A greater percentage of A ….than B.
More A …than B.
A outnumber B.
..has a larger percentage of..
大于 bigger/higher/arge/greater
小于smaller/lower

数据A=B
1）be equal with
2)be matched by
3)percentages of A and B are the same(数字)
4)the percentage of A is the same as that of B(数字
5)A account for the same percentage as B(数字).
6)A accounts for 数字，which is matched by B.
7)A and B are equal at 数字

数据比较A约等于B
be about/ approximately equal with

The percentages of A and B are similar(数字 and 数字 respectively).
The percentage ofA is similar to that of B(数字 and 数字respectively)
A account for a similar percentage to B(数字).
A accounts for 数字，similar to the percentage of B(数字).
A accounts for 数字，which is closely matched by B (数字).

倍数关系，A 是B的几倍
1)A account for/constitute+百分比,twice/threetimes as large as B counterparts
Female students accounted for 70%, twice/threetimes/four times as large as male counterparts。
2)The proportion of A is twice/three times as large as that of B.
The proportion of female students is twice/thretimes/four times as large as that of males
3)The proportion of A doubles/triples/quadruples that of B.
The proportion of female students doubles/ triples/quadruples that of males.

数据差异
显著的 Substantial， remarkable， obvious
细微的 slight， small
差异 gap, difference
1)the biggest/ widest gap/ difference
The biggest gap + be + at+ 阶段(the level of )、种类(the category of )
The biggest difference was at the lowest level, where 90% of those who held a skilled vocational diploma were men, compared with 10% of women.

极值
1)部分+made up +the largest part
The electricity produced by coal made up the largest pa!
2)The largest part of+整体+be done by+部分
The largest part of electricity production was produced by using coal
3)部分+rank+first.
The electricity produced by coal ranked first.

降序排列法
A occupies the largest/highest/maximal proportion, with 数字, while E accounts for a tiny share, with 数字. A further 数字 altogether of 上义词 is shared by B and C,constituting 数字 and 数字 respectively. The remaining 数字 is due to D.

B accounts for 数字,second only to A(数字).C and D maintain middle positionsrepresenting 数字collectively. And E takes up the smallest/lowest/minimalproportion of 数字.

动态图

主体段分为两段
一段写上升,不变
一段写下降,新出现,others
概括:需要概括谁上升,谁下降,谁不变

表示趋势上升

1)表示上升,不带程度

upward adi.向上的(常用来修饰趋势)
e.g. The figure for ltaly showed an upward trend since 1940 ( a rising trend一个上升的趋势)

increment n.上升，增加
e.g. An increment can be observed in the generation of electricity from 1980to 1990

2)表示上升,且自带程度

表示趋势下降

1)表示下降,不带程度

downward adj.向下的(常用来修饰趋势)
e.g. This downward trend finished in 1998decrement n.上升，增加
e.g. There was a continuous decrement in the urban population of Newportover the time

2)表示下降自带程度

幅度修饰词

1)表示剧烈的趋势变化

2)缓和的变化趋势

表示波动


表示平稳

1)变量+ remain stable/unchanged /constant/unvarying + at +数据 +时间
2)变量+ stabilize /level off/plateau+at+数据+时间
3)变量+ reach aplateau+at+数据+时间

极值的表达

1)变量+ hit /reach asummit/peak+at+数据+时间
2)变量+ peak+at+数据+时间
3)变量+ reach its lowest/highest point+at+数据+时间
4)XX bottom out+at+数据+时间

交点的表达

1)变量 A+ and+变量 B+ are equal at 数据+时间
2)变量 A+overtake/surpass+变量B+at+数据+时间
3)变量 A+ and+变量 B+meet+at+数据+时间

趋势句型

1)over the period from…to…the…remained level 在…至…期间，..基本不变
2)the number of…remained steady/stable from … to…. ..月(年)至…月(年)…的数量基本不变
3)the percentage of…stayed the same between…and…..至…期间…的比率维持不变
4)the percentage of…is slightly larger/smaller than that of…..的比例比…的比例略高(低)
5)….decreased year by year while…increased steadily….逐年减少，而…逐步上升
6)there is an upward trend in the number of… ..数字呈上升趋势
7)a considerable increase/decrease occurred from…to… 从…到…发生急剧上升/下降
8)there had been asteady increase to roughly….有一个稳定的增长达到大约..
9)In general, it is apparent that the average number of … decreasedsteadily from… to…很明显…的数量从…到…逐步减少
10)… revealed a trend of gradual decline, whereas… witnessed an oppositetendency, namely, a steady rise.
11)Obviously, there was a dramatic fall in… , reducing from about… to 很明显有一个巨大的下降在.，，下降范围从…到…
12)Nevertheless,… experienced a slight fluctuation.尽管如此，。,经历了轻微的波动!
13)There was a stable growth accompanied by occasional fluctuations.伴随着偶尔的起伏，有稳定的增长
14)… fell significantly from the original… to the final.从最初的…到最终
的…大幅度地下降了!15)It peaked at approximately… and afterwards began to show minor dropbefore finally ending up at…它高达大约…之后开始展现出小幅度下降，在达到…

最大最小值句型

the figures peaked at…in(month/year)..的数目在…月(年)达到顶点，为….
the number sharply went up to… 数字急剧上升至…
the situation reached a peak of/a high pointat%…的情况(局势)到达顶(高)点，为..百分点。
the figures/situation bottomed out in…数字(情况)在..达到底部
have led to the largest amount of……已经达到了最大的量
had undoubtedly the greatest number of…, while …constituted the least.毫无疑问，…是最大的数量，而…占据的最少.
…is the largest rate at …
…take the leading position
…ranks the first, taking up…
….ranks the first, which contributes to…

动态图补充

定点数据

1)变量+ 特点(顶 or 底),at 具体数值
In 1979, the consumption of beef was the largest of these foods, ==at== about 225 grams per person per week.
2)变量+ 特点(顶 or 底),with 具体数值
In 1979,the consumption of beef was the largest amongthese foods, ==with== about 225 grams per person per week.
3)变量+特点(顶 or 底)，(具体数值)主要用于长句，避免描述多个数据而使句子过于冗长
In 1979, the consumption of lamb was similar to that of chicken (around 150 grams), but much less fish was consumed (just over 50 grams).

趋势句子

1)趋势句子+from+起点数值+to+终点数值+between起点时间 and 终点时间 /from+起点数值 in 起点时间 +to终点数值 in 终点时间
The figure for the older people in the USA increased ==from 9% to15%== between 1940 and 1980
An increase from ==10% to 27%== is predicted in the figure for the old in Japan between 2030 and 2040.
2)趋势句子+to+终点数值+in+终点时间
The figures for the Western countries grew ==to 14%== in around 1990
The year 2040 will see a significant increase ==to 27%== in the figurefor the old in Japan.
3)趋势句子(动词结构)+by+差值+起终点时间趋势句子(名词结构)+of+差值+起终点时间
The figure for the older people in the USA increased ==by 6%== between 1940 and 1980.
There will be ==an increase of 17%==(增加了17%) in the figure for the old in Japanbetween 2030 and 2040.

动态数据(现在分词)

1)趋势句子，reaching+终点数值+in+终点时间
The figures for the Western countries grew, ==reaching 14%== in around 1990.
the figures for the Western countries saw a growth, ==arriving at 14%== in around 1990.
==amounting to, standing at==
2.1)趋势句子(动词句型),showing+趋势名词 +of+差值
The figure for the older people in the USA increased between1940 and 1980, ==showing a rise of 6%==.
==experiencing, witnessing==替换showing
2.2)趋势句子(名词句型),v.+ing +by+差值
The figure for the older people in the USA saw a growthbetween 1940 and 1980, ==increasing by 6%.==
==只适用于变量做主语!!==

动态数据(定语从句)

1)趋势句子-时间段 when it/they reach+终点数值
The figures for the Western countries grew significantly between1940 and 1980 ==when they reached 14%==.
The figures for the Western countries ==saw a significant growth== between 1940 and 1990 when they reached 14%.
2.1)趋势句子-时间段, during which periodit/they+变化动词+by+差值
A significant growth occurred in the figures for the Western countries between 1940 and 1980, ==during which period they rose by 6%.==

不纠结具体数据

1 大于/高于: above, over, more than
2 小于/ 低于: below, under, almost
3 约等于: around, about, approximately, nearly, almost
4 仅仅: only, just, merely

其他趋势加数据

平稳:
1)变量+remain/ keep/ holdstable/ steady/ flat/ unchanged at+ 数字
2)变量+level off/ level out/plateau/ stabilize at+数字3)a+“平稳”名词+at+数字
波动:
1)变量+fluctuated from +数据+to+数据
2)afluctuation+from+数数据+to+数据

逻辑衔接词

逻辑衔接词in addition, then, next, additionally, moreover, furthermore
同一趋势内的衔接
①then/afterwards +句子
②after/before+趋势动词-ing
③followed by+a趋势名词
① lt rose. Then it decreased.
②) after rising, it decreased.
it had risen before dropping.
③ lt rose, followed by a decrease.
不同变量间的衔接
①相似趋势:also,similarly, likewise
②不同趋势:in contrastby contrast, by comparison,on the other hand, but, however

A sport I’ve never done but would really like to try is diving, particularly in Hainan Province. Diving involves exploring underwater environments, often using special equipment such as ==scuba gear==, to see marine life and underwater landscapes ==up close.==

-How
I first learned about diving through ==documentaries and travel shows== that ==highlighted== the beauty of ==underwater ecosystems.== Programs like “Blue Planet” by BBC showed ==breathtaking underwater scenes== that captured my imagination. Additionally, friends who have gone diving shared their incredible experiences and photos, which further ==sparked my interest.==

-When and where
Sanya is famous for its beautiful beaches and crystal-clear waters, making it a popular spot for water sports. While relaxing on the beach, I saw ==several groups of divers== preparing to go underwater. Their excitement and the professional way they handled their equipment ==caught my attention.== Later, I even took a boat tour that allowed us to ==observe some shallow water diving,== and the colorful ==coral reefs== and vibrant fish were truly ==mesmerizing(迷人的).==

-Why
1.diving offers a unique opportunity to explore a completely different world beneath the surface of the water.
2.diving is known to be a peaceful and meditative experience.
it can make people escape from the reality into the underwater world
3.diving in Hainan Province, with its warm waters and abundant marine life, seems like the perfect place to start this adventure.

-Conclusion
diving is a sport that has fascinated me for a long time due to its exploration of underwater beauty and serenity(平静). Watching divers in Hainan and hearing stories from friends has only increased my desire to try it myself. I look forward to experiencing the thrill and tranquility of diving one day.
